mapper.insert: insert into tb_order (id, user_id, order_number, create_time, detail) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, order_number, create_time, detail from tb_order
